resources.string: Hello Everyone! This is the LOAVES app. Don\'t be fooled by the app\'s title; this is a very serious app that may save your bacon! Using a camera, LOAVES can help you watch over your home, family, or any other important family belongings.

This project was made by a group of five students at Utah State University. Go Aggies!
